alert.note: Alert for Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Greer; Kingfisher; Noble; Washita (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 23 at 7:59AM CST until February 24 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM CST THIS MORNING... ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...For the Wind Chill Advisory, very cold wind chills. Wind chills as low as 10 below zero. For the Winter Weather Advisory, mixed precipitation expected. Total sleet accumulations of up to eight tenths of an inch, and ice accumulations of a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of central, northern, southwest and western Oklahoma. * WHEN...For the Wind Chill Advisory, until 10 AM CST Wednesday. For the Winter Weather Advisory, from 6 AM Wednesday to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning or evening commute. The cold wind chills could result in hypothermia if precautions are not taken.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. Use caution while traveling outside. Wear appropriate clothing, a hat, and gloves. For the latest road conditions call 8 4 4 4 6 5 4 9 9 7.

area.areaDesc: Beckham; Blaine; Custer; Greer; Kingfisher; Noble; Washita
